numbered_ace_sentences: 1. This graph shows percentages of people of color in professional sports.
2. Basketball has the most players of color.
3. Baseball has the least players of color.
4. Soccer has the most coaches of color.
5. Womens basketball has the same number of players of color as mens basketball.
6. Football has the least coaches of color.
7. Football has the third highest number of players of color.
8. I wonder why basketball has the most players of color.
9. I wonder why baseball has the least players of color.
10. I wonder why football has the least coaches of color.
11. I wonder why soccer has the most coaches of color.
12. The impact on me is not great.
14. I am a man of color.
15. My skin color does not affect me in any way.
16. The title is: Percentages of colored people in professional sports.
